sponsors.name: Baner 4Lions Football Academy
sponsors.description: 4 Lions is a renowned name in football coaching for young boys and girls in Maharashtra. With an AIFF accreditation and certified coaches it has a streamlined approach to training football talent. Some feathers in its cap are having its players selected by professional clubs like the Reliance Foundation, the Madras Football Club, Bangalore Football Club etc., the Pune District team, state level matches conducted by the Western India Football Association and the iLeague. 4 Lions now has a new branch in Baner (at Ascend Arena, opposite Manvaar sweets, Pancard Club Road). With state-of-the-art field, accredited by FIFA, and convenient parking, it is a location that increases the catchment area to tap talent at an eary stage.

sponsors.name: Dalnex
sponsors.description: Through IoT, AI, and automation, Dalnex helps factories digitize their shopfloors for real-time visibility and smarter decisions. Our Industry 4.0 platform, FactOS, connects machines and processes, while our interoperable IoT Edge Gateways ensure seamless integration across systems. Dalnex is driven by automation and IoT experts shaping the next generation of efficient, data-driven factories.
sponsors.tagline: Powering the future of smart manufacturing

sponsors.name: GROWWTH
sponsors.description: At GROWWTH, we specialize in professionally managed, diversified investment solutions designed to help investors build long-term wealth. Her Financial strength becomes everyone's Strength!

sponsors.name: The PowerPoint CoWorking & Managed Spaces
sponsors.description: At The PowerPoint Co-Working & Managed Spaces, we're transforming the way businesses experience Real Estate. Through our Real Estate as a Service (REaaS) model, we deliver comprehensive, End-to-End solutions from identifying the right property to architectural design, engineering, and complete facility management. Whether you're looking for a ready-to-move-in office or a Built-to-Suit Workspace customized to your brand, The PowerPoint Co-Working & Managed Spaces provides spaces that are as functional as they are inspiring. We proudly serve startups, multinational corporations, and GCCs, helping every client find a workspace that fits their vision and workflow. With our streamlined execution process, we guarantee fully furnished & Built-to-Suit Managed Office possession within 60 days.
sponsors.tagline: Everything you need from space to structure, from blueprint to business all under one roof.
